name: CGImageMetadataType
desc: Constants that indicate the XMP type for a metadata tag.

items.name: case `default`
items.desc: The default type for new tags.

items.name: case arrayUnordered
items.desc: An array that doesnâ€™t preserve the order of items.

items.name: case arrayOrdered
items.desc: An array that preserves the order of items.

items.name: case alternateArray
items.desc: An ordered array, in which all elements are alternates for the same value.

items.name: case alternateText
items.desc: An alternate array, in which all elements are localized strings for the same value.

items.name: case structure
items.desc: A collection of keys and values.
